Description_lang: Word of Glory's mana cost is reduced by $s1% and now reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Freedom by ${$s3/1000} sec when cast, but its healing is reduced by $s2% when cast on allies.

description_blz.en_US: Word of Glory's mana cost is reduced by 100% and now reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Freedom by 2 sec when cast, but its healing is reduced by 50% when cast on allies.
description_blz.es_MX: El costo de maná de Palabra de gloria se reduce un 100% y ahora reduce el tiempo de reutilización de Bendición de libertad 2 s al lanzarlo, pero su sanación se reduce un 50% al lanzarlo sobre aliados.
description_blz.pt_BR: Reduz em 100% o custo de mana de Palavra de Glória e agora reduz em 2 s a recarga da Bênção da Liberdade quando lançada, mas sua cura é reduzida em 50% quando lançada em aliados.
description_blz.de_DE: Die Manakosten von 'Wort der Herrlichkeit' werden um 100% verringert und verringern jetzt beim Wirken die Abklingzeit von 'Segen der Freiheit' um 2 Sek., aber die Heilung wird beim Wirken auf Verbündete um 50% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Word of Glory's mana cost is reduced by 100% and now reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Freedom by 2 sec when cast, but its healing is reduced by 50% when cast on allies.
description_blz.es_ES: El coste de maná de Palabra de gloria se reduce un 100% y ahora reduce 2 s el tiempo de reutilización de Bendición de libertad cada vez que se lanza, pero su sanación se reduce un 50% cuando se lanza sobre aliados.
description_blz.fr_FR: Le coût en mana de Mot de gloire est réduit de 100 % et réduit désormais le temps de recharge de Bénédiction de liberté de 2 s lorsqu’il est lancé, mais ses soins sur les personnages alliés sont réduits de 50 %.
description_blz.it_IT: Riduce il costo in mana di Parola di Gloria del 100% e ora riduce il tempo di recupero di Benedizione della Libertà di 2 s al lancio, ma ne riduce le cure fornite del 50% se lanciata sugli alleati.
description_blz.ru_RU: Затраты маны на "Торжество" снижаются на 100%. "Торжество" сокращает время восстановления "Благословенной свободы" на 2 сек., но восполняет здоровье союзникам с эффективностью 50%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 영광의 서약의 마나 소모량이 100%만큼 감소합니다. 또한 시전 시 자유의 축복의 재사용 대기시간을 2초만큼 감소시키지만 아군에게 시전 시 치유량이 50%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 施放時，榮耀聖言的法力消耗降低100%，且現在會使自由祝福的冷卻時間縮短2秒，但對盟友施放時，其治療效果降低50%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 荣耀圣令的法力消耗降低100%，现在施放时使自由祝福的冷却时间降低2秒，但对盟友的治疗效果降低50%。
